title: Patch 6.9
body:
The next patch looks like so much fun. I'm actually excited to play League again, got a little boring there for a while. For a hidden buff I think "good" Supports are going to be massive with the QSS and boot enchant changes.

Anyone else have any thoughts?

replies.body:
eh, I'm not too keen on some of the changes to the champions and the new items are going to be big IMO.
I personally like what they did with the old items and changed them to suit match ups and not to just give a lot of damage.
I did like those changes too. It'll be interesting to see the Rift Herald and Dragon buffs.
